original: intros X H. unfold enumerable__T. intros [f Hf]. exists (fun n => match ofNat option f n with | Some x => Some (Some x) | None => Some None end). intros x. specialize (Hf x). destruct (Hf) as [n Hn]. exists n. destruct (ofNat option f n) eqn:E. - simpl in Hn. inversion Hn. subst. reflexivity. - simpl. reflexivity.
